definitions.definition: Refers to a standard workweek employee, often equivalent to an individual working a full schedule of hours, which typically means 40 hours per week.
definitions.term_usage_example: Our project needs 2 **FTEs** to complete the development on time.

definitions.definition: Hace referencia a un empleado que trabaja la jornada laboral completa, lo que generalmente equivale a 40 horas a la semana.
definitions.term_usage_example: Me contrataron como FTE, así que trabajaré 40 horas a la semana con beneficios completos.
